name: Mitigation Playbook for Phishing Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an employee fell victim to a phishing attack resulting in the download of a malicious backdoor.

action--5fe50477-2484-4851-b963-5cf817e0.name: Isolate affected workstation from the network
action--5fe50477-2484-4851-b963-5cf817e0.description: Disconnect the affected workstation to prevent further unauthorized access.

parallel--f1f6dd4f-f706-4ccc-aafe-d66a45.name: Execute multiple mitigation actions
parallel--f1f6dd4f-f706-4ccc-aafe-d66a45.description: Run antivirus scan and remove malicious files concurrently.

action--6a2e6acd-bbff-4c1b-8884-c903e0b6.name: Run full antivirus scan
action--6a2e6acd-bbff-4c1b-8884-c903e0b6.description: Scanning the device for malicious files.

loop--6a2e6acd-bbff-4c1b-8884-c903e0b6a7.name: Antivirus scan repeating
loop--6a2e6acd-bbff-4c1b-8884-c903e0b6a7.description: Repeat the scan until the system is clean.

action--22e5076a-b9e9-469f-8b75-5ed72fe3.name: Remove malicious executable
action--22e5076a-b9e9-469f-8b75-5ed72fe3.description: Clean up the malicious file that was downloaded.

action--711a1826-3b89-4b90-8b84-bcbf9a2a.name: Patch software vulnerabilities
action--711a1826-3b89-4b90-8b84-bcbf9a2a.description: Applying security patches to ensure the system is secure.

action--6020b43e-5ffd-4f24-88c7-b915b6e4.name: Inform user about phishing attack
action--6020b43e-5ffd-4f24-88c7-b915b6e4.description: Notify the user of the phishing attempt and provide guidance.
